title: Creativity
description: Thinking of novel and productive ways to do things; includes artistic achievement but is not limited to it.

title: Curiosity and Interest in the World
description: Taking an interest in ongoing experience for its own sake; finding subjects and topics fascinating; exploring and discovering.

title: Judgment (Critical Thinking and Open-Mindedness)
description: Thinking things through and examining them from all sides; not jumping to conclusions; being open to new evidence and reasoning.

title: Love of Learning
description: Mastering new skills and topics; adding systematically to what one knows; motivated by a deep passion for knowledge.

title: Perspective (Wisdom)
description: Having a broader view of the world; providing wise counsel to others; understanding life in ways that make sense to self and others.

title: Bravery
description: Not shrinking from threat, challenge, difficulty, or pain; speaking up for what is right; acting on convictions even if unpopular.

title: Perseverance
description: Finishing what one starts; persisting in a course of action despite obstacles; taking pleasure in completing tasks.

title: Honesty
description: Speaking the truth and acting in a sincere way; presenting oneself genuinely and taking responsibility for one's feelings and actions.

title: Zest
description: Approaching life with excitement and energy; not doing things halfway; feeling alive and activated.

title: Love
description: Valuing close relationships; being warm and genuine; caring deeply for others and receiving care in return.

title: Kindness
description: Doing favors and good deeds for others; helping and taking care of people without expecting rewards.

title: Social Intelligence
description: Being aware of the motives and feelings of self and others; knowing how to navigate social situations effectively.

title: Teamwork
description: Working well as part of a group; being loyal to the team; doing one’s share and promoting group cohesion.

title: Fairness
description: Treating people equally; giving everyone a fair chance; being guided by principles of justice and equity.

title: Leadership
description: Organizing and encouraging a group to get things done while maintaining good relations among members.

title: Forgiveness
description: Forgiving those who have wronged you; giving people second chances; letting go of anger and resentment.

title: Humility
description: Letting accomplishments speak for themselves; not regarding oneself as more special than others.

title: Prudence
description: Being careful about one’s choices; not taking undue risks; considering the long-term consequences of actions.

title: Self-Regulation
description: Regulating what one feels and does; being disciplined; controlling appetites and emotions.

title: Appreciation of Beauty and Excellence
description: Noticing and appreciating excellence, beauty, and skilled performance in various domains of life.

title: Gratitude
description: Being aware of and thankful for the good things that happen; expressing appreciation and returning kindness.

title: Hope
description: Expecting the best in the future and working to achieve it; believing that a good future is possible.

title: Humor
description: Liking to laugh and tease; bringing smiles to others; seeing the light side; making and enjoying jokes.

title: Spirituality
description: Having coherent beliefs about the higher purpose and meaning of life; understanding where one fits in the larger scheme.
